info.description:
=================================
Maintenance Equipment Custom Info
=================================

This module extends maintenance equipments to allow having custom properties on
them.

**Table of contents**

.. contents::
   :local:

Usage
=====

To use this module, you need to:

* Ensure belonging to *Display in maintenance equipment form* security group.
* Go to *Maintenance* > *Equipments*.
* Edit or create one.
* Got to *Custom Info* page.
* Choose or create a template for custom information.
* Set values for the properties of that template.

Bug Tracker
===========

Bugs are tracked on `GitHub Issues <https://github.com/OCA/maintenance/issues>`_.
In case of trouble, please check there if your issue has already been reported.
If you spotted it first, help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed
`feedback <https://github.com/OCA/maintenance/issues/new?body=module:%20maintenance_equipment_custom_info%0Aversion:%2013.0%0A%0A**Steps%20to%20reproduce**%0A-%20...%0A%0A**Current%20behavior**%0A%0A**Expected%20behavior**>`_.

Do not contact contributors directly about support or help with technical issues.
